solution_line_template: Cody needs to read {total_books} books - {first_week_books} books - {second_week_books} books = <<{total_books}-{first_week_books}-{second_week_books}={remaining_books_after_initial_weeks}>>{remaining_books_after_initial_weeks} books.

Cody read {books_per_week_after} books each week after = {remaining_books_after_initial_weeks} books / {books_per_week_after} books per week = <<{remaining_books_after_initial_weeks}/{books_per_week_after}={weeks_for_remaining_books}>>{weeks_for_remaining_books} weeks.

Cody read for {first_initial_week} week + {second_initial_week} week + {weeks_for_remaining_books} weeks = <<{first_initial_week}+{second_initial_week}+{weeks_for_remaining_books}={total_weeks}>>{total_weeks} weeks total.
